    The Chattanooga Guides Series

    Live on Music Square : 06-21-2025

    When: 2025-06-21 (Friday)
    Time: 6:00pm to 9:00pm
    Venue: Cambridge Square
    Address: 9440 Bradmore Ln, Ooltewah, TN 37363
    Entrance Fee: free
    Event Website
    #music#free

    Join in the fun at Cambridge Square every Saturday during the warm months for live music evenings that light up the square with the energy of local and regional bands. Enjoy a diverse lineup of genres, from jazz and rock to pop, in the welcoming atmosphere of our community hub. Gather with friends and family for nights filled with good music and great vibes.

    Featuring:
    June 7th: Joe C. Deville Music
    June 14th: Courtney Daly and The Grind
    June 21st: Forever 13
    July 12th: Zacharia Dallas
    July 19th: Wilson And Cross Bluegrass
    August 16th: Doubleshots/Texissipi SIP
    August 30th: Mother Legacy
    September 13th: Forever 13
    September 20th: Joel Beaver Band
    September 27th: Ariel Omarzu
